name: Scotcoin
description: Scotcoin is a social impact currency committed to driving positive change. As an ‘ethical crypto,’ it leverages blockchain technology to create meaningful and scalable social impact worldwide. At its core, Scotcoin is ‘crypto for good’—redefining how digital assets engage with the world by promoting sustainability, inclusion, and ethical finance. Held by a growing community of 6,000 individuals globally, Scotcoin operates as an ERC20 token on the Ethereum Mainnet, combining the security and efficiency of blockchain with a mission to make a real difference.
